headline: BRK.B or AIG: Which Insurance Stock Should Investors Bet On?
summary: AIG's higher ROE, capital returns and recent rally put it ahead of Berkshire in a shifting insurance market. Does it deserve your bet?

raw.headline: BRK.B or AIG: Which Insurance Stock Should Investors Bet On?

headline: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods Maintains Outperform on American International Gr, Raises Price Target to $97
summary: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods  analyst Meyer Shields   maintains American International Gr (NYSE:AIG) with a Outperform and raises the price target from $96 to $97.

raw.headline: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods Maintains Outperform on American International Gr, Raises Price Target to $97
raw.summary: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods  analyst Meyer Shields   maintains American International Gr (NYSE:AIG) with a Outperform and raises the price target from $96 to $97.

headline: AIG attributable profit slides to $735m in Q4
summary: In general insurance, the company's P&C business, GWP totalled $8.07bn in the quarter compared to $8.02bn a year ago.

raw.headline: AIG attributable profit slides to $735m in Q4
raw.summary: In general insurance, the company's P&C business, GWP totalled $8.07bn in the quarter compared to $8.02bn a year ago.

headline: A Look At AIG’s (AIG) Valuation After Strong Q4 Earnings And Capital Returns
summary: American International Group (AIG) just paired a stronger fourth quarter with another return of cash to shareholders, reporting higher adjusted after tax income per share, improved underwriting income, and continued buybacks and dividends. See our latest analysis for American International Group. The strong Q4 report, fresh acquisitions in Convex and Onex, and a reaffirmed dividend appear to have lifted sentiment, with a 4.6% 1 day share price return and improving short term momentum. Longer...
